name: Runescape wiki DarkMode (fandom)
description:
⛔️ DEPRECATED This style will not receive any further updates. For a dark theme on the new runescape wiki site head over to https://github.com/CephHunter/RS-wiki-Darkmode A dark version of the Runescape Wiki on wikia/fandom. This will turn all backgrounds to a shade of gey, including while editing pages. Perfect for those late night gaming sessions!
Some images: https://imgur.com/a/Ka7sp
